unnormalised: Hey, good initiative by the govt. on solar rooftop subsidies! Finally, cheaper electricity bills, eh? Imagine saving Rs. 5000 a month – that's like a sweet Onam bonus! Heard Sharmaji in Bangalore got it done, reduced his dependence on BESCOM by a lot! Hope the paperwork isn't too much of a hassle. Gotta look into this before Diwali! Imagine lighting up the whole house guilt-free. My cousin, Priya, installed it in her Nagpur flat too, says it's worth it.
normalised: Hey, good initiative by the government on solar rooftop subsidies! Finally, cheaper electricity bills, eh? Imagine saving five thousand rupees a month – that's like a sweet Onam bonus! Heard Sharmaji in Bangalore got it done, reduced his dependence on B E S C O M by a lot! Hope the paperwork isn't too much of a hassle. Gotta look into this before Diwali!
